content: My group at Microsoft is hiring! We have an open position for a researcher and a principal researcher. The research area is quite flexible; the topics in the job description are a disjunction. :smile:

And we're hiring again, now for a senior researcher. The posting is for a larger organizational unit than last time, so don't be scared by the longer list of research areas. We're looking for people in any one of those areas, and if you're doing formal methods or ML or programming languages, then you definitely fit the description.
